item.word: while company a saw waste output fall over the 15 years period, the amount of waste produced by company C increased considerably
item.trans: 在15年的时间里，a公司的锯子废料产量下降，而C公司的锯子废料产量却大幅增加

item.word: Such dramatic differences are not seen when we compare the figures for industrial water use
item.trans: 当我们比较工业用水的数据时，就看不到如此巨大的差异了

item.word: there are three level of post-school qualifications, whose holders include more men than women
item.trans: 大学毕业后的资格有三个级别，其中男性多于女性

item.word: But the gap between the three categories had narrowed considerably from 1999 to 2002
item.trans: 但从1999年到2002年，这三个类别之间的差距显著缩小
